title: How to write a reflection paper - Quora

response.answer_text: The reflection paper is one of my favorite types of papers. It allows you to express your thoughts, feelings and reasoning. So, I suggest you to relax, jot down a few ideas about the topic and then write your first draft, let it lay down for a few hours and come back again with the critical view. Definitely, you can write such papers only when you have ideas, so take your time to think and evaluate your views.

Any kind of reflection paper requires to write according to your opinion. In simple words, what I learn from chosen topic, why that topic is important, and how that topic will help me in future. Always use, I/We while writing reflection paper.
This is a classroom question that is kind of great, because you can usually write about the things that stuck with you most. Follow the instructions.
